pdf.head:
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
		
	</#if>
    
        
            

        <#if subsidiary??></#if>
        Packing Slip
	
	

	${salesorder.tranid@label} ${salesorder.tranid}
	
	

	Item Fulfillment# ${record.tranid}
	
	

	${record.trandate}
	



	${salesorder.shipaddress@label}
	${salesorder.billaddress@label}
	 
	
	

	${salesorder.shipaddress}
	${salesorder.billaddress}
	${salesorder.custbody_sophone@label}: ${salesorder.custbody_sophone}
${salesorder.entity.mobilephone@label}: ${salesorder.entity.mobilephone}${record.custbody_consig_num}
${salesorder.entity.custentity_alt_contact_name@label}: ${salesorder.entity.custentity_alt_contact_name}
${salesorder.entity.altphone@label}: ${salesorder.entity.altphone}
	
        
        
            

	 
	Page:  of
pdf.body:
<#if record.item??>
  
    <#list record.item as item>
      <#if item_index==0>
        
          

          Item
          Description
          ${item.location@label}
          Qty
          Units
          ${item.custcol_delivery@label}
          ${item.custcol_pick_up@label}
          Cash Carry
          <#if item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts' || item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts - Frames' || item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts - Mat' || item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts - Net' || item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts - Misc Parts' || item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts - Rods'>${record.custbody_tramp_version@label}<#elseif item.item! ='Install Trampoline'>${record.custbody_fulfillment_tramp_model_list@label}<#else> </#if>
          
        
      </#if>
        

          ${item.item}${item.memberitem}
          ${item.description}
          ${item.location}
          ${item.quantity}
          ${item.unitsdisplay}
          ${item.custcol_delivery}
          ${item.custcol_pick_up}
          ${item.custcol_cash_n_carry}
          <#if item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts' || item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts - Frames' || item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts - Mat' || item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts - Net' || item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts - Misc Parts' || item.custcol_item_class! ='Spare Parts - Rods'>${record.custbody_tramp_version}<#elseif item.item! ='Install Trampoline'>${record.custbody_fulfillment_tramp_model_list}<#else> </#if>
        
      
        <#if item.custcol_acs_item_model != '' && component?has_content>
            <#list component.member as member>
              <#if member.parentkitid == item.itemkey>
                

                  ${member.itemname}
                  ${member.description}
                   
                  ${member.quantity}
                  ${member.unit}
                   
                   
                   
                   
                
              </#if>
            </#list>
        </#if>

      </#list>
  

  

      Shipping Method
       
      ${salesorder.linkedtrackingnumbers@label}
      
      

      ${record.shipmethod}
       
      ${salesorder.linkedtrackingnumbers}
      
  

  

      ${record.custbodycustbody_addonremarks@label}
      
      

      ${record.custbodycustbody_addonremarks}
      
      

      ${record.custbody_notesspecialrequests@label}
      
      

      ${record.custbody_notesspecialrequests}
      
  
</#if>
